product-description: View and edit products for the entire company
product-modal-description: Fill in the details below to create a product

update-product-modal.update-product-modal-description: Here you can update a product

files.title: Files
files.file-rejected_too-many-files: {{name}} kunne ikke uploades da du prøver at uploade for mange filer
files.file-rejected_file-too-large: {{name}} kunne ikke uploades da filen er for stor
files.upload-error: Your file was not uploaded. Try again.
files.drag-inactive: Drag and drop, or click to choose files
files.delete-title: Do you want to delete the file?
files.delete-description: This action is permanent and cannot be undone.

disable-batch-dialog.title: You are about to disable batch tracking for this product
disable-batch-dialog.description: If you disable batch tracking, this product will no longer be associated with any batch numbers. If you wish to re-enable batch tracking later, you will need to manually move inventories to the relevant batch numbers. Do you want to continue?

server.attachment-not-created: File was not created in database
server.file-not-yours: File does not belong to your company
server.file-not-deleted-bucket: File was deleted but is still attached to your company
server.file-not-deleted-database: File was deleted but still exist in our database
server.file-not-deleted-both: File was not deleted. Try again

reorder.title: Restock
reorder.description: Get notified when a product is below minimum stock.
reorder.no-reorder-description: This item has no minimum stock level. Create one to be notified when it falls below the minimum.
reorder.orderAmount-description: This is used to prefill the ordered quantity when recording reorders.
reorder.maxAmount-description: Can be left at 0 to ignore.
reorder.delete-title: Do you want to remove restock?
reorder.delete-desc: This action will remove this item from the restock overview. This means that NemLager will no longer notify when stock reaches a certain amount. Restock can be re-enabled at any time.
reorder.delete-toast-error: Restock was not removed. Try again.

default-placement-dialog.title: Update default placement
default-placement-dialog.about-to-update: You are about to update the default placement to
default-placement-dialog.update-will-move-inventories: If you update the default placement, all inventories will be moved to

remove-default-placement-dialog.title: Remove default placement
remove-default-placement-dialog.remove-description: If you remove the default placement, this item will be able to use all placements at this location

delete-product-modal.title: Delete product
delete-product-modal.description-delete: Are you sure you want to delete the product
delete-product-modal.description-history: The product's history will not be deleted
delete-product-modal.copy-failed: Could not save sku to clipboard
